snippet: With the help of Mr. J.H. Stevenson and other   correspondents he had now, as we have seen, been able (regretfully   giving up the possibility of a Macgregor lineage) to identify his   forbears as having about 1670 been tenant farmers at Nether Carsewell   in Renfrewshire.
